title: PS.I.Love.You.CAM.XViD-F4U
description:
Release Info
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Theater Date:......... 4 January 2008 (UK)
Release Date:......... 18 February 2008
IMDB Rating:.......... 6.8/10 (2,567 votes)

What you do ?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

2) Enjoy 


NOTES:
This is a re-encode of the prevail source, The release is cropped mainly at the 
top and a little at the sides also there is some noise in the audio now and again, 
but apart from that it\\\\\\\&#039;s a pretty good CAM.

Open Before And After.jpg To See Before (the original source) And After (this
release), i am sure you you will notice a dramatic improvement in the coulor.

or go to http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/636/beforeandafterji3.jpg to see the before and after picture (it is way more blured in the picture as it is taken from moving video) however i included it to show the diffrence in colour



WORK DONE:
Firstly i cleaned up the video so it was not so white and looked more like its 
original intended colour by making it a tad darker and add some contrast, also 
added more chroma to it. i also boosted the audio to 150% and cut a few minites 
from the start of the video, the movies has not started and none of the movie 
has been lost all i cropped off was the person adjusting the camera before the 
movie and a little right at the end of the movie during the titles when all
you could hear was background noice and you could just see black.
